column4: I need advice as to getting my dvb-t usb card recognizing the firmware. The relevant firmware is saved in /lib/firmware, but if I look at dmesg it does not even try to load the firmware
Is there a driver module for the device?
not sure, how do I check, I have followed the  linux tv instructions up to now
What is the device reported as with lsusb?
AFAICT, dvb-usb-af9015 is the module name. Does lsmod|grep dvd show any output?
No output means success. Now check lsmod to see the module loaded and dmesg for any additional messages
Looks good. Now can you use the device?
Well that is as far as I can help you since I am not familiar with the specific type of device you are using
thanks for everything, I'll keep trying
Note that the modprobe command loaded the driver. lsmod lists the currently loaded modules and dmesg outputs your system log information (stuff like driver errors etc)
